meanings.definition: To drink an excessive amount of alcohol.
meanings.sent1: She felt sick after overdrinking at the party last night.
meanings.sent2: It is important to avoid overdrinking to stay healthy.
meanings.sent3: He learned his lesson about overdrinking when he woke up with a headache.
meanings.sent4: Overdrinking can drown your sorrows but won't solve your problems.
meanings.sent5: The dangers of overdrinking were evident in his slurred speech and unsteady gait.

meanings.definition: The act of consuming too much alcohol.
meanings.sent1: Overdrinking can lead to serious health issues.
meanings.sent2: She was worried about her friend's overdrinking habits.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show highlighted the consequences of overdrinking in a humorous way.
meanings.sent4: His overdrinking was like pouring gasoline on a fire, making the situation worse.
meanings.sent5: The news report warned about the dangers of overdrinking during the holiday season.
